Class: DirectoryFinder

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Finder\DirectoryFinder.coffee

Overview

DirectoryFinder

Author:

  • Marvin Frachet marvin@konsserto.com

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) getDirs(rootDir, recursive) Method finding and pushing the directories found in the directories variable
  • # (void) name(name) Method filtering the directories by name
  • # (void) notName(name) Method filtering the directories by name (doesn't contain the name are kept)
  • # (void) sortBy(orderby, orderway) Method ordering the directories resultset
  • # (Directory) getResult() Method returning the directories variable

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor()

Class constructor

Instance Method Details

# (void) getDirs(rootDir, recursive)

Method finding and pushing the directories found in the directories variable

Parameters:

  • rootDir ( String ) — Root directory where the search starts
  • recursive ( Boolean ) — Is the search recursive in folders ?

# (void) name(name)

Method filtering the directories by name

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name that should filters the directories variable

# (void) notName(name)

Method filtering the directories by name (doesn't contain the name are kept)

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name that should filters the directories variable

# (void) sortBy(orderby, orderway)

Method ordering the directories resultset

Parameters:

  • orderby ( String ) — Order by the attribute
  • orderway ( Boolean ) — Order by the orderway direction (DESC, ASC)

# (Directory) getResult()

Method returning the directories variable

Returns:

  • ( Directory ) — directories
